name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Golang Developer with over 10 years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, leveraging **Golang**, **Kubernetes**, and **OpenStack-like SDK**. Proficient in building robust CI/CD pipelines and implementing observability tools such as **Prometheus** and **Grafana** for enhanced system monitoring. Experienced in utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure as code and **Helm** for managing Kubernetes applications, ensuring streamlined deployment processes.

Demonstrated expertise in agile methodologies, enabling rapid delivery of enterprise-level applications. Versatile with a tech stack that includes **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and extensive hands-on experience with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept at leading the development of solutions embedding AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and automation, while maintaining the integrity of secure and compliant systems. Practical knowledge in MLOps, managing production workflows with tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about creating impactful systems that balance technical excellence with real-world usability.
